title: Barfield's Argument for the Gift of Language: Its Power, Purpose and Past
description:
Michael and Karen discuss the first half of Chapter 4 of Speaker's Meaning by Owen Barfield.

Imagination and Inspiration
Speaker's Meaning and Lexical Meaning
Phylogeny and Paleontology
